badFaithStatementOverride: Failure will not be rewarded mercenary...
goodFaithStatementOverride: There is no such thing as second place in a war....
shortDescription: After having disabled several Water Purification Plants with no incident, you got request for reinforcment accross the continent. Scout elements have encountered a defended Water Purification plant. Having no anti-Mech capabilites, the scout element has asked for your support
longDescription: Stay alert down there. Ronin have probably by this point picked up upon our activities.

contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy Water Purification Plant and Escape

dialogueContent.words: Welcome to the Deep Desert, Commander.
Move up less than half a click to NW and you'll spot the installation, Sir.
We spotted a 'Mech garrison lance supported by a heavy turret systems. There is another heavy lance patrolling the area.
If you are quick enough, you may avoid having to engage the heavy lance. Let the thirst kill them off.
Good job, Commander. I'll contact you once you are back on the Argo.
You'd better return to the Argo, Commander, so we can sort this out.
Hurry up Sir! The heavy lance is barely half click away
We are done here - head to the evacuation point
Mercenaries have started their attack on the plant, Sir.
<color=#FF0000>We are getting wrecked over here! Where is my support!?</color>
That was the last of the garrison forces, Sir.
